name: Google - Dual-color header
description: For people who want google to look weird.
additional_info: Don't mind the autograb, it doesn't represent the final result. This style only affects the left and middle sections of the Google search header, giving the right side of the search bar a rounded appearance by rounding the right side of the search button and the element below it. It presents an interesting look for the search bar, and it's less tedius to deal with than the dark header style that requires even more tweaking. Think of it as "Dark header lite". 06/29/2014 Class change, added larger border to make it stand out better. Improved front-page description. 07/02/2014 Class change. 07/04/2014 Class change. 07/08/2014 Class changes. 07/12/2014 Class change. 07/30/2014 Class changes. 08/26/2014 Okay, this requires a little explanation. There has not been a tectonic plate shift in the Google verse, so I could knock this out in a matter of minutes. Why the long wait then? I was involved in other projects outside of here. Shame on me. Anyway, here's the update! Just some class changes, and the addition of the G+ left side. 09/22/2014 Class changes. 10/27/2014 Class changes. 11/15/2014 Class changes. 12/07/2014 Class changes. 12/16/2014 Extensive class changes. 01/16/2015 Class changes.
